info.name: Demo Conference API
info.description: A sample API with information related to a technical conference.  The available resources  include *Speakers*, *Sessions* and *Topics*.  A single write operation is available to provide  feedback on a session.

request.description: Retreive a representation of a single session by Id

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
